nodes.text: Rendili Star Systems was the company that adapted and incorporated Mandalorian starship designs into the design of the Dreadnaught-class heavy cruiser sometime before 100 BBY. It was apparently a subsidiary of Rendili StarDrive.
Although The Dreadnaughts of Rendili states that Rendili Star Systems produced the Dreadnaughts, all other sources say they were designed by Rendili StarDrive.
